personal.name: Rutao Luo
personal.title: AI Expert in Finance
personal.tagline: Building intelligent systems at the intersection of AI, finance, and cloud.

summary.label: Strategic AI Leadership
summary.text: Over 5 years of experience leading transformative AI/ML projects and teams. Expert in driving innovation through data science, with a proven ability to deliver solutions that enhance operational efficiency, customer experience, and personalization across various sectors.

summary.label: Technical & Product Management
summary.text: Deep technical expertise in AI/ML including predictive modeling, NLP, LLM, and cloud technologies. Skilled in translating complex business requirements into actionable data-driven strategies.

summary.label: Agile Development & SDLC
summary.text: Extensive experience with SDLC and agile project management, leading cross-functional teams to deploy scalable data analytics solutions in fast-paced environments.

summary.label: Stakeholder Engagement
summary.text: Exceptional ability to engage with senior business stakeholders, articulating complex ideas with clarity and persuasively influencing strategic direction based on data insights.

summary.label: Distinguished Publishing Record
summary.text: Authored numerous impactful journal articles and papers in modeling of bio-systems (HIV disease), earning almost 300 citations, reflecting a significant contribution to the field.

summary.label: Coaching & Mentoring
summary.text: Recognized for effectively guiding both data scientists and machine learning engineers, enhancing team skills and professional growth.

experience.title: Financial AI Specialist / Lead
experience.summary: Delivering end-to-end vertical AI solutions for highly regulated industries, including foundation models, agentic AI systems, and enterprise-grade AI governance.
bullets: Structured data agent: Designed and implemented an LLM-driven agent that transforms natural-language questions into validated, governed structured-data operations (e.g., SQL), producing reliable, non-hallucinatory answers grounded in enterprise datasets.

Unstructured data agent: Built a hybrid LLM + Knowledge Graph reasoning system that retrieves, interprets, and reasons over free-form documents and unstructured content using semantic search, embeddings, and contextual understanding.

experience.title: Principal Data Scientist
experience.summary: Steered the strategic roadmap for the data science team, devising innovative AI solutions to enhance Vanguard's business operations across marketing, fraud detection, client experience, and governance.
bullets: Team Leadership: Championed continuous learning, leading LLM training sessions that elevated team technical prowess; mentored data scientists and ML engineers through complex project lifecycles.
Revenue Generation: Implemented AI-driven strategies generating millions in revenue and achieving a major financial milestone every year.

Enhanced Personalization: Led hyper-personalization systems serving millions of personal investors using Multi-Armed Bandit (MAB) and reinforcement learning; developed recommender systems improving conversion rates and reducing attrition.
GenAI Application Leadership: Spearheaded pilot of GenAI applications using LLM, RAG, and RLHF — including Crew Assistance, Voice Bot, and Call Summarization.
130% PAS Growth: Drove a 130% increase in Personal Advice Service leads through a real-time ML solution.
Risk Mitigation: Employed LLM technologies and audio signal processing for proactive fraud detection and cognitive decline assessment.
Blockchain Data Security: Standardized and secured CRSP market index data using blockchain technology to ensure data integrity and auditability.
Marketing & Sales: Built multiple propensity models to amplify conversion rates in advice, ETFs, and other Vanguard products.
Client Experience Index (CXI): Innovated the CXI to measure client experiences across all retail divisions using operational data and call transcripts.
Governance Leadership: Led development of a comprehensive model governance guide and GenAI governance framework ensuring responsible, scalable, and compliant AI deployment.

experience.title: Senior Data Scientist
experience.summary: Spearheaded development of ML and AI models to enable data-driven decision-making for retail investor group marketing.
bullets: Designed ML models for RIG (Retail Investor Group) marketing initiatives, contributing to targeted and effective campaigns.
Pioneered research in optimization, deep learning, and reinforcement learning to enhance business processes.
Improved customer experience by providing precise forecasts of queue-level phone call demand and recommending optimal staffing strategies.
Led Vanguard's analytics team transition from traditional platforms to a cutting-edge big data and unified cloud analytics platform.

experience.title: Engineer III – Data Analytics
experience.summary: Led advanced modeling and data analysis for Comcast's next-generation network optimization budget.
bullets: Spearheaded advanced modeling crucial to network forecasting and Comcast's budget plan for next-generation network optimization.
Designed and implemented budget models tailored for Next-Generation Network Architecture.
Leveraged machine learning and Big Data technologies to elevate customer experience and service quality.
Mentored and trained junior engineers in algorithm design and coding, fostering professional development.

experience.title: Research Control System Engineer
experience.summary: Led design and development of GE's Trip Optimizer — an Ecomagination product that autonomously manages locomotive throttle and brake systems to optimize train schedules and minimize fuel consumption.
bullets: Applied mathematical modeling and optimization techniques to generate optimal trip plans, improving operational efficiency.
Designed and implemented real-time control algorithms for embedded systems in locomotives.
Contributed to significant fuel cost savings through autonomous throttle and brake optimization.

experience.title: Research Assistant
experience.company: University of Delaware — Dept. of Electrical & Computer Engineering
experience.summary: Conducted research in nonlinear control theory with focus on mathematical biology and medicine, particularly HIV treatment optimization.
bullets: Developed mathematical models for disease systems using nonlinear control techniques to identify innovative therapeutic strategies.
Investigated HAART (Highly Active Antiretroviral Therapy) extension approaches to prevent drug-resistant HIV strains.
Published as first author in five world-class journals and five refereed conference papers; garnered ~300 citations.
Research featured in Science Daily and NPR (National Public Radio).
Utilized MATLAB, C++, R, SAS, and SPSS for research.

education.degree: Master of Science in Electrical Engineering
Master of Science in Applied Mathematics
Bachelor of Science in Control Engineering

certifications.name: SAS Certified Base Programmer for SAS 9
SAS Certified Advanced Programmer for SAS 9

publications.authors: Rutao Luo, Michael J. Piovoso, Javier Martinez-Picado and Ryan Zurakowski

publications.title: Optimal antiviral switching to minimize resistance risk in HIV therapy
publications.authors: Rutao Luo, Michael J. Piovoso, Javier Martinez-Picado and Ryan Zurakowski

publications.title: Controlling the Evolution of Resistance
publications.authors: Rutao Luo, LaMont Cannon, Jason Hernandez, Michael J. Piovoso and Ryan Zurakowski

paragraphs: I find genuine satisfaction in mentoring — taking something complex and making it click for someone else. Outside of meetings and models, that often looks like a robotics kit on the kitchen table with my kids, which is as good a test of patience and creativity as any professional challenge.

I stay curious through reading — finance, AI, and the occasional deep dive into how large systems break and recover. Travel and photography round out the picture: both are good reminders that the most interesting things are usually hiding in plain sight.
